definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The incomplete blue circle on the city emblem represents Keelung Harbor and the surrounding environment.
sentences.chinese: 本市市徽的藍色缺口圓環代表基隆自然環境港埠。

sentences.english: Now lets place some secondary shapes, rings around the pipe.
sentences.chinese: 現在放些二級形，環繞管子的圓環。

sentences.english: You have to leave the surface of a torus.
sentences.chinese: 那麼它就必須脫離這個圓環面。

sentences.english: But you can also create a torus or sphere by extruding along a circular path.
sentences.chinese: 但是還可以沿着圓形路徑擠壓來創建圓環體或球形。

sentences.english: At some point a circle appears.
sentences.chinese: 在某一時刻會出現一個圓環。

sentences.english: Those who show extent decorate very special, the cirque that layer upon layer photograph covers seem.
sentences.chinese: 展示區域的佈置十分特別，好似層層相套的圓環。

sentences.english: It's like a lots of little rings all joined together.
sentences.chinese: 就好像很多小圓環串在一起。

sentences.english: The symbol, called the Borromean rings, depicts three rings linked together.
sentences.chinese: 這個符號稱爲博羅梅安戒指，描繪聯在一起3個圓環。

sentences.english: The effect of sets of cirque costing-energy is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了圓環套數對減震效果的影響。

sentences.english: I'm orange or light brown with dark brown circles or spots.
sentences.chinese: 我是橘紅色或淺棕色的，上有深棕色的圓環和斑點。

sentences.english: Weared by the numerous small ring.
sentences.chinese: 由無數小圓環穿編而成。

sentences.english: The straight rod and the planar ring are two special cases of helix.
sentences.chinese: 直杆和圓環杆爲螺旋線狀態的兩種特例。

sentences.english: The new problems on research of circovirus were brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 對豬圓環病毒的研究提出了新的問題。

sentences.english: The general circle loop theory was put forward, mathematical models were set up, and four basic types were given.
sentences.chinese: 提出廣義圓環論，建立數學模型，給出四種基本類型。

sentences.english: Onion ring structure in the welding zone is embodiment of metal flowing behavior.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥圓環是攪拌摩擦焊焊核區中材料流動的集中體現。

sentences.english: Mandalas are circular designs arranged in layers radiating from the center.
sentences.chinese: 曼荼羅是從中心往外水平輻射排列的圓環設計。

definition: bend in a street/corner/to turn a corner
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
